channel.title: Error when compiling, please help
channel.description:
Im gettin this read error, im using this as my run command...
[glow=green,2,300]@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" server pause[/glow]
and im gettin this error...
[glow=red,2,300]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . .[/glow]
If i could get any help on this it would be kindly appreciated.
Thank-you
[glow=purple,2,300]HAPPY NEW YEAR!!![/glow][br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2007, 10:19:29 AM[/size][hr]please help :|

item.title: Error when compiling, please help
item.dc:creator: @Msvatk Msvatk
item.description:
@Msvatk wrote:

green dude:

Its not you!You just need a good source - this on isn’t completed or has an error on it.Try downloading a new version on the same file from other link.I had the same problem with testscape like 2 months before…

nah ive tried it with different sources and origianl sources, i dont know if havin my directory for java in 64-bit program files could be affectin it, ill have 2 try

Read full topic

item.title: Error when compiling, please help
item.dc:creator: @Msvatk Msvatk
item.description:
@Msvatk wrote:

Im gettin this read error, im using this as my run command…

[glow=green,2,300]@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAME Client
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe” server
pause[/glow]

and im gettin this error…

[glow=red,2,300]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Press any key to continue . . .[/glow]

If i could get any help on this it would be kindly appreciated.

Thank-you
